page.title: 14Garages:Woodmancote/Nibley
page.content: The full address is Woodmancote Garage Services Ltd. The business incudes new and used cars and servicing. Used cars are the most profitable. Most buyers are private individuals. There has been a garage on this site since the 1920's. It is an Austin Rover agent and their best selling car is the Metro. Being the nearest Austin agent they get quite a few customers from Nibley. It is a good position for a garage because it is on one of the main roads into Dursley. Whiteway Hill Garage:services are petrol sales, servicing and general stores.The shop is the most profitable as it is used as a village shop. Warners Garage, North Nibley:business comes from petrol sales and servicing. Most trade comes from locals and some from tourists.
